<% if(db_type == "mysql" || db_type == "postgresql"){ %>
select * from DMS_PZ_luXian order by ids asc limit ? offset ?
<% } else if(db_type == "oracle"){ %>
select * from ( select a.*, rownum rn from (select * from DMS_PZ_luXian) a where rownum < ? ) where rn >= ?
<% } else if(db_type == "sqlserver"){ %>
select top {0, number, #.#} * from DMS_PZ_luXian where ids not in ( select top {1, number, #.#} ids from DMS_PZ_luXian )
<% } else if(db_type == "db2"){ %>
select * from ( select b.*, rownumber() over() as rn from ( select * from DMS_PZ_luXian ) as b ) as a where a.rn < ? and a.rn >= ?
<% } %>

FROM ( SELECT SUM (a.meteringMoney) money, SUM (a.byFNum) num, shijian FROM ( SELECT jl.meteringMoney meteringMoney, b.byFNum byFNum, jl.ids, jl.confirmTime, CAST ( YEAR (jl.confirmTime) AS VARCHAR ) + '年' + CAST ( MONTH (jl.confirmTime) AS VARCHAR ) + '月' shijian FROM DMS_JL_jiLing jl, DMS_BY_weiXiuBaoYanP b WHERE jl.byIds = b.ids ) a GROUP BY shijian
) aa where 1=1
